author: dsmiley
msg: LUCENE-6034: Highlighter QueryScorer/WeightedSpanTermExtractor shouldn't re-invert a term vector based TokenStream. It can now highlight payload-sensitive queries.

author: jacopoc
msg: Added to all the Tomcat connectors the commented out setting for the "address" parameter: this is useful when you run multiple instances of OFBiz in the same server each bound to a different hostname/IP address.

author: nmalin
msg: Converted humanres CRUD service to entity-auto for entity PartyQual, PartyResume, PartySkill, PerfReview, PerfReviewItem, PerformanceNote, Employment, EmploymentApp, PartyBenefit, PayGrade, PayHistory, PayrollPreference, SalaryStep, TerminationReason, UnemploymentClaim, EmplPosition, EmplPositionFulfillment, EmplPositionReportingStruct, EmplPositionResponsibility, ValidResponsibility, SkillType, ResponsibilityType, TerminationType, EmplPositionType, EmplPositionTypeRate, AgreementEmploymentAppl, EmplLeave only on update, EmplLeaveType, JobRequisition, EmploymentApp, JobInterview, JobInterviewType, PersonTraining, TrainingClassType, EmplLeaveReasonType.
